incoming.page_description.en: Share sensitive information securely with our support team
incoming.page_description.translation: Tohaina ngā kōrero ngaro ki tō mātou rōpū tautoko

incoming.feature_disabled_description.en: This feature is currently disabled. Please contact support for assistance.
incoming.feature_disabled_description.translation: Kei te monokia tēnei āhuatanga i tēnei wā. Pā mai ki te tautoko mō te āwhina.

incoming.memo_placeholder.translation: He whakamārama poto (hei tauira, Tono tautuhi kupuhipa anō)

incoming.memo_hint.en: Help us route your message to the right person
incoming.memo_hint.translation: Āwhina mātou ki te tuku i tō karere ki te tangata tika

incoming.recipient_aria_label.en: Select a recipient for this secret
incoming.recipient_aria_label.translation: Kōwhiria he kaiwhiwhi mō tēnei mea huna

incoming.recipient_hint.en: Choose who will receive this secure message
incoming.recipient_hint.translation: Kōwhiria ko wai ka whiwhi i tēnei karere haumaru

incoming.no_recipients_available.translation: Kāore he kaiwhiwhi e wātea ana

incoming.secret_content_placeholder.en: Paste sensitive information here (passwords, keys, etc.)
incoming.secret_content_placeholder.translation: Whakapiri kōrero ngaro ki konei (kupuhipa, kī, me ērā atu)

incoming.secret_content_hint.en: This information will be encrypted and only viewable once
incoming.secret_content_hint.translation: Ka whakamunaina ēnei kōrero, kotahi noa te wā ka kitea

incoming.success_description.en: Your secure message has been delivered.

incoming.success_info_title.translation: He aha te mea e pā mai ana?

incoming.success_info_description.en: The recipient will be able to view this secret only once. After they view it, the secret will be permanently deleted.
incoming.success_info_description.translation: Ka taea e te kaiwhiwhi te tiro i tēnei mea huna kotahi noa te wā. I muri i te tiro, ka mukua tūturu te mea huna.

incoming.tagline2.en: Keep passwords and private data out of email and chat logs
incoming.tagline2.translation: Kia tawhiti atu ngā kupuhipa me ngā raraunga tūmataiti i te īmēra me ngā rārangi kōrerorero

incoming.end_of_experience_suggestion.translation: Tiakina tō rīhīti mō ō rēkōtanga.
